Summary: AT LEAST 20 OBJECTS FLYING BEHIND EACH OTHER, VERY BRIGHT AND VERY FAST
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Westland
There were no other sightings in Westland on or around November 14th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI WENT OUT ON MY BALCONY AND AT FIRST I THOUGHT I SAW AN AIRPLANE, I LIVE CLOSE TO DETROIT METRO AIRPORT, SO LIGHTS ARE OFTEN ABOVE, BUT THEN ANOTHER CAME BEHIND IT, AND ANOTHER, AND ANOTHER, THEY WERE FAST AND BRIGHT AS S**T, THEY HAD RED AND BLUE LIGHTS ON THE ENDS AND WHITE LIGHTS TOO, THERE WAS ONE ALL BLUE AND IT WAS THE FASTEST,I HAVE NEVER SEEN ANYTHING SO FAST AND BRIGHT. THEY WERE SO CLOSE TO EACH OTHER, THEY COULD NOT HAVE BEEN AIRPLANES. SOME OF MY NEIGHBORS WHO WERE OUTSIDE SAW THEM ALSO, WE COULD NOT BELEIVE WHAT WE SAW! THEN THEY ALL FLEW OFF TO THE NORTH
